full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/4/2023 AFFIDAVIT TO MARITAL RELATIONSHIP FACTS Date: June 15, 1985 I, Chi, Yu-Liang ist 7 ), the undersigned, after being duly sworn, do depose and testify: 1. That I am a citizen of Republic of China, hold ID Card Number E100318708, residing at No. 11, Lane 93, Ku-shan 3rd Rd., Ku- shan Dist., Kaohsiung City, Taiwan, R.O.C. 2. That my wife is Chi, Chou Ching-Ying We married on September 13, 1933 at Feng-yang Hsien, Anhwei Province. 3. That our Marriage Certificate has been lost many years ago and unable to get it reissued. 4. That we have census record in Taiwan, R.O.C., here presented an Extract of Household Registration to Kaohsiung District Court as evidence to the aforesaid facts. Further the affiant saith not Chi you line a (Husband: Chi, Yu-Liang ) the Kaohsiung District Court, Taiwan, Attested on this / day, June 1985 ,at Republic of China, that the Signature/Seal in this document is authentic.
